# What is R-Ladies?

- R-Ladies is a world-wide organization with the mission of promoting **gender diversity in the R community**  

- Started in San Francisco in 2012 and now has **187 chapters and more than 63,000** members globally (check out rladies.org for a SHINY dashboard)
<center>
![](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EPlDKUQUcAEq5pw?format=jpg&name=small)

# R-Ladies St. Louis 

* Started in September 2017 by Jenine Harris and Chelsea West 

* 4 Meetups in 2017-2018, 5 Meetups in 2018-2019, and 5 for 2019-2020!
   
    - **TODAY! Our 12th Meetup!** Introduction to R Shiny with **Dr. Angelique Zeringue** (Daugherty Business Solutions) 

    - Mar 17: Qualitative analysis in R with **Mary Painter** (UMSL) 

    - Apr 2: Making personal websites with blogdown with **Dr. Dorris Scott** (WUSTL)
    
* RSVP on Meetup
